member.name: T:NServiceBus.ConfigureUnityBuilder
member.summary: Contains extension methods for configuring object builder infrastructure through Unity container.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ConfigureUnityBuilder.UnityBuilder(NServiceBus.Configure,Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Use the Unity builder passing in a preconfigured container to be used by nServiceBus.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.Unity.UnityObjectBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Instantites the class with a new UnityContainer.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.Unity.UnityObjectBuilder.#ctor(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Instantiates the class saving the given container.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.Unity.UnityObjectBuilder.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the container and all resources instantiated by the container.

member.name: M:NServiceBus.ObjectBuilder.Unity.UnityObjectBuilder.BuildChildContainer
member.summary: Returns a child instance of the container to facilitate deterministic disposal of all resources built by the child container.
